message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the item but also allows for a fair exchange that respects its value to both parties. I look forward to your consideration of this offer. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.
